Activity: Arrive at office. Check email and financial news.
Continue evaluating the potential for building a custom solution for tracking fund performance and expenses. Assess the feasibility and cost-effectiveness of this option.

Contact @larch-1 (Lead Software Architect) and @sdev-1 and @sdev-2 (Software Developers) via email. Subject: Custom Fund Accounting Solution - Feasibility Assessment. Request a preliminary estimate of the time and resources required to build a custom solution. Briefly outline the key requirements.
Based on SEC requirements and the tracking framework, create a data dictionary defining all the fields needed for fund accounting. Include field names, data types, descriptions, and source systems.
Lunch break. Quick run to the gym for a workout.
Refine the preliminary framework based on the cost/benefit analysis. Solidify the key data elements and reporting processes.
Work on the presentation for tomorrow's meeting. Incorporate feedback from the various discussions and finalize the recommendation on software vs. custom development.
Practice the presentation. Prepare answers for potential questions from stakeholders.
Wrap up for the day. Double check the presentation is ready.
